newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks end down as strike curtails trade.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks end down as strike curtails trade.

text.p: Pakistani stocks closed down on Tuesday on bearish sentiment in a brief session cut short by a strike called by the militant Sunni Moslem Sipah-e-Sahaba Pakistan (SSP) group, dealers said.

The Karachi bourse closed early because of thin attendance as the 100-share index ended 2.94 points, or 0.21 percent, down at 1,429.63 amid nine losers and one gainer. HUBCO fell 0.35 to 36, PTC 0.30 to 27.90 and ICI Pakistan 0.15 to 17.95.
The SSP called the strike to protest against the killing of its leader in a bomb blast in Lahore on Saturday.
